description:
11.148 limiter
Limits the pixel components values to the specified range [min, max].

The filter accepts the following options:

max.description: Upper bound. Defaults to the highest allowed value for the input.

min.description: Lower bound. Defaults to the lowest allowed value for the input.

planes.description: Specify which planes will be processed. Defaults to all available.

name: limiter

parameters.description: Lower bound. Defaults to the lowest allowed value for the input.
parameters.name: min

parameters.description: Upper bound. Defaults to the highest allowed value for the input.
parameters.name: max

parameters.description: Specify which planes will be processed. Defaults to all available.
parameters.name: planes

source:
11.148 limiter

Limits the pixel components values to the specified range [min, max].

The filter accepts the following options:

min

Lower bound. Defaults to the lowest allowed value for the input.

max

Upper bound. Defaults to the highest allowed value for the input.

planes

Specify which planes will be processed. Defaults to all available.
